story_24_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: I never thought they’d make it past Elesa’s team.
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’m not sure which surprises me more—that or
Team Break’s invasion.
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Heh. [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team really is
at the center of this little storm.
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
There aren’t too many teams left. It’s possible
we’ll face [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team in
the next round.
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I’m sure [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he’ll" F="she’ll" ] be surprised to find out you’re on
our team...
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
A battle is a fluid thing, and the advantage
changes back and forth. That kind of uncertain
chance is what makes it interesting.
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: I’m going to really enjoy battling [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ].
story_24_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
It’ll be a great battle that will rage like churning
waters on the stormy seas...
